# SoftwareAgent

## Summary

A software agent.


## Description

A SoftwareAgent is a software program that is given the authority (similar to a user's authority) to act on a system.


## Metadata

- Instantiability: Concrete
- name: SoftwareAgent
- SubclassOf: Agent

| Property | Type | minCount | maxCount |
